full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA 'PHAGS MA GDUGS DKAR MO'I LAS BZHI'I SBYIN SREG DNGOS GRUB NYIN BYED 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010B (CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS 'PHAGS MA GDUGS DKAR MO'I LAS BZHI'I SBYIN SREG DNGOS GRUB NYIN BYED 'DREN PA'I SHIN RTA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA MER GEN DGE SLONG RIN CHEN BZANG POS BSKUL NGOR, SLOB DPON CHEN PO TZANDRA GO MI DANG, RDO RJE RNON PO DANG, PAn CHEN BZANG PO BKRA SHIS GSUM GYIS MDZAD PA'I GZHUNG GI DGONGS DON GTZO GZUNG ,SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA GZHAN LAS KYANG LEGS CHAS KHA BSKANGS TE, MANG THOS RGYAL KHAMS PA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG 'JIGS DBANG PO 'AM, MING GZHAN DGE SLONG RATNA SHRIS MTSON SNGON GYI 'GRAM DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN SNGAGS RAM PA BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO'O,, ,,DGE'O, ,)
